hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t1.uuid as uuid, t1.create_time as create_time, t1.creator as creator, t1.modifier as modifier, t1.modify_time as modify_time, t1.rec_ver as rec_ver, t1.name as name, t1.id as id, t1.code as code, t1.entity as entity, t1.entity_name as entityName, t1.start_row as startRow, t1.type as type, t1.system_unit_id as system_unit_id, t1.module_id as module_id from cd_excel_import_rule t1 where 1=1 <if moduleId??> and t1.module_id=:moduleId </if> <if isNotBlank(whereSql)> and ${whereSql} </if> <if isNotBlank(orderBy)> ${orderBy} </if>
